3DHead Property

CDXML Name:Head3D
CDX Constant Name:kCDXProp_3DHead
CDX Constant Value:0x0207
Data Size:CDXPoint3D
Property of objects:kCDXObj_Graphic, kCDXObj_Arrow
First written/read in:ChemDraw 8.0
Required?No

Description:

The 3D location (in the order of X-, Y-, and Z-locations in right-handed coordinate system) of the head of an object in CDX coordinate units.

This is currently only used for objects (such as arrows) with distinct heads and tails
